namespace.name: tjdo
namespace.usage-description: JDO tags specific for Triactive Java Data Objects (TJDO).
namespace.condition-description: Field that is part of an inverse map.

tag.name: tjdo.field
tag.usage-description: The tjdo.field tag gives access to the TJDO extensions at the field level to be included in the generated jdo metadata.
tag.condition-description: The jdo.field tag must be present

parameter.name: column-length
parameter.usage-description: String fields can specify the maximum length of the String that will be stored in the database column. This should be with the sql.column stuff.

parameter.name: owner-field
parameter.usage-description: Specifies the column in the detail table that is the foreign key to this object. For inverse set and inverse map.

parameter.name: key-field
parameter.usage-description: Specifies the column in the related table that is the map key for the inverse map. Used with inverse map.

parameter.name: collection-field
parameter.usage-description: Specifies the column in the master table that this object is in an inverse set detail relationship with.

parameter.name: map-field
parameter.usage-description: Specifies the column in the master table that this object is in an inverse map detail relationship with.
